title: How to Make Chocolate Peanut Butter Truffles

steps.headline: Add peanut butter chips and butter to saucepan.
Heat over low heat to melt the ingredients.
Add sweetened condensed milk and vanilla and stir.
Cook mixture until thickened and blended, about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and place on counter to cool.
Put cooled mixture into the refrigerator.
Shape into walnut size pieces and roll into balls.

text: Add peanut butter chips and butter to saucepan.  Heat over low heat to melt the ingredients.  Add cocoa and stir.  Add sweetened condensed milk and vanilla and stir.  Cook mixture until thickened and blended, about 5 minutes.  Remove from heat and place on counter to cool.  Put cooled mixture into the refrigerator.  Let chill 2 hours.  Shape into walnut size pieces and roll into balls.  Roll in powdered sugar.  Chill.  Store in the refrigerator.
